sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react" import './styles/Creation.css' export default function Creation (){ const [input, setInput] = useState({ name: '', image: null, types: [], hp: '', attack: '', defense: '', speed: '', height: '', weight: '' }) function handleSubmit(e){ const {name, hp, attack, defense, speed, height, weight} = input const newPoke = { name, hp: parseInt(hp), attack: parseInt(attack), defense: parseInt(defense), speed: parseInt(speed), height: parseInt(height), weight: parseInt(weight) } console.log(input) e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:3001/pokemons', newPoke) .then(r => r.json) .then(r => {console.log(r)}) .catch(e => {console.log(e)}) } function handleChange(e){ setInput({...input, [e.target.id]: e.target.value}) } return (
) }
